title: When to perform outbound services?
intro: In addition to inbound services, Customer Service performs outbound contacts with customers, especially in promotional campaigns and actions related to Group Cards:

t1.title: 1. Card activation
t1.text: Contact customers to activate new cards issued.

t3.title: 3. Promotion communication
t3.text: Inform about exclusive offers and benefits.

t4.title: 4. Cancellation reversal
t4.text: Work to retain customers wishing to cancel services.
